English.Text:
No-one could have predicted this journey back in March 1998, when an unassuming new challenger entered, named “Anno 1602”, daring to take on the more established strategy competitors of its day.

And what a journey it has since been!

In these 20 years, we have enjoyed our own history together. We have seen the renaissance, and the age of enlightenment. We have even travelled into the future, settled the ocean floor and colonized the moon.
